alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 06 at 2:23AM PDT until May 08 at 3:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SATURDAY TO 3 AM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Mojave Desert and Eastern Mojave Desert. * WHEN...From 11 AM Saturday to 3 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Western Mojave Desert
